Typedef Documentation

typedef void( * parseBlocks_t)(GLuint programHandle)

a callback that can gather all the info about the uniform blocks that are in a shader program

Function Documentation

static void TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage ( GLuint  errorNumber,
const GLchar *  errorMessage = nullptr 
)
inlinestatic
49 {
50  switch (errorNumber)
51  {
52  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_NOT_INITIALIZED:
53  {
54  printf("Error: TinyShaders must first be initialized \n");
55  break;
56  }
57 
58  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_STRING:
59  {
60  printf("Error: given string is invalid \n");
61  break;
62  }
63 
64  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_PROGRAM_NAME:
65  {
66  printf("Error: given shader name is invalid \n");
67  break;
68  }
69 
70  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_PROGRAM_INDEX:
71  {
72  printf("Error: given shader index is invalid \n");
73  break;
74  }
75 
76  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_NAME:
77  {
78  printf("Error: given shader component name is invalid \n");
79  break;
80  }
81 
82  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_INDEX:
83  {
84  printf("Error: given shader component index is invalid \n");
85  break;
86  }
87 
88  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_FILE_PATH:
89  {
90  printf("Error: given file path is invalid %s \n", errorMessage);
91  break;
92  }
93 
94  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_PROGRAM_NOT_FOUND:
95  {
96  printf("Error: shader with given name %s was not found \n", errorMessage);
97  break;
98  }
99 
100  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_NOT_FOUND:
101  {
102  printf("Error: shader component with given name %s was not found \n", errorMessage);
103  break;
104  }
105 
106  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_TYPE:
107  {
108  printf("Error: invalid shader type given \n");
109  break;
110  }
111 
112  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_FAILED_SHADER_LOAD:
113  {
114  printf("Error: failed to compile %s shader component \n", errorMessage);
115  break;
116  }
117 
118  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_FAILED_SHADER_PROGRAM_LINK:
119  {
120  if (errorMessage != nullptr)
121  {
122  printf("Error: failed to link program %s \n", errorMessage);
123  }
124  break;
125  }
126 
127  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_ALREADY_EXISTS:
128  {
129  printf("Error: shader component with this name %s already exists \n", errorMessage);
130  break;
131  }
132 
133  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_PROGRAM_ALREADY_EXISTS:
134  {
135  if (errorMessage != nullptr)
136  {
137  printf("Error: shader with this name %s already exists \n", errorMessage);
138  break;
139  }
140  }
141 
142  case TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SOURCE_FILE:
143  {
144  printf("Given Source file is invalid");
145  break;
146  }
147 
148  default:
149  {
150  break;
151  }
152  }
153 }
